CustomField.description: Used in query on the violation engine to provide a subset of case roles eligible for a liability
CustomField.formula:
IF( ( CASE ( Role__c , 'Business' , 'TRUE' , 'CEO' , 'TRUE' , 'CFO' , 'TRUE' , 'Chief' , 'TRUE' , 'Corporate Officer' , 'TRUE' , 'Guarantor' , 'TRUE' , 'Manager' , 'TRUE' , 'Managing Member' , 'TRUE' , 'Owner' , 'TRUE' , 'Secretary' , 'TRUE' , 'Subsidiary' , 'TRUE' , 'Treasurer' , 'TRUE' , 'President' , 'TRUE' , 'Vice President' , 'TRUE' , 'Case Employer' , 'TRUE' , 'Partner' , 'TRUE' , 'Partnership' , 'TRUE' , 'FALSE' ) = 'TRUE' || ( CONTAINS ( TEXT ( Role__c ), 'Defendant' ) && !CONTAINS ( TEXT ( Role__c ) , 'Attorney' ) && !CONTAINS ( TEXT ( Role__c ) , 'Representative' )) || CONTAINS ( TEXT ( Role__c ), 'Successor' ) || CONTAINS ( TEXT ( Role__c ), 'Employer' )
) , TRUE, FALSE ) && ( !ISPICKVAL(Case_Role_Status__c, 'No Longer Active On Case') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is set by a formula. contact your administrator if you need to add or remove roles from those eligible to be liable parties.
CustomField.label: Eligible for Liability
